languages.text: "Весьма смущает, Лорд-капитан. Я слышал, что у них есть гадания, которые указывают на жертву, и это меня беспокоит. Что, если завтра они решат убить кого-то не того? Но культ разрешен на корабле, и я вынужден мириться с тем, что убийцы ходят среди нас".

traits.locale_text: "Весьма смущает, Лорд-капитан. Я слышал, что у них есть гадания, которые указывают на жертву, и это меня беспокоит. Что, если завтра они решат убить кого-то не того? Но культ разрешен на корабле, и я вынужден мириться с тем, что убийцы ходят среди нас".

languages.text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."
languages.original_text: "Весьма смущает, Лорд-капитан. Я слышал, что у них есть гадания, которые указывают на жертву, и это меня беспокоит. Что, если завтра они решат убить кого-то не того? Но культ разрешен на корабле, и я вынужден мириться с тем, что убийцы ходят среди нас".

traits.locale_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

{n}Eddock's gaze darkens. He takes longer than usual to reply.{/n} "I don't, Lord Captain. The Bloodweavers are His most loyal and unsullied servants. They wouldn't do harm for no reason. And their sacred rituals serve another important purpose in helping keep the bay's population at optimum levels."

"I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

{n}The captain's gaze darkens, and there is an unusually long pause before he replies.{/n} "I do not, Lord Captain. The Bloodweavers are His most loyal and unsullied servants. They wouldn't do harm for no reason. And their sacred rituals serve another important purpose by helping keep the bay's population at optimal levels."

But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

languages.text: «Desde luego que sí, Lord Capitán. Dicen que escogen a sus víctimas basándose en augurios, y para mí eso es pedir problemas a gritos. ¿Y si deciden matar a quien no deben? Pero el culto tiene autorización oficial para llevar a cabo sus actividades, así que no me queda más remedio que tolerar la presencia de asesinos entre nosotros».
languages.original_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego que sí, Lord Capitán. Dicen que escogen a sus víctimas basándose en augurios, y para mí eso es pedir problemas a gritos. ¿Y si deciden matar a quien no deben? Pero el culto tiene autorización oficial para llevar a cabo sus actividades, así que no me queda más remedio que tolerar la presencia de asesinos entre nosotros».

languages.text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。彼らはお告げに基づいて犠牲者を選ぶと聞きました。もし、殺すべきでない人を殺すことになったら？ですが、教団の行為は公式に許されていることなので、殺人鬼が我々の中を歩くことを容認するしかないのです」
languages.original_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、ロード・キャプテン。彼らはお告げに基づいて犠牲者を選ぶと聞きました。もし、殺すべきでない人を殺すことになったら？ですが、教団の行為は公式に許されていることなので、殺人鬼が我々の中を歩くことを容認するしかないのです」

languages.text: “我觉得这显然不太对劲，舰长大人。我听说，他们杀人全靠什么预兆，这对我来说简直是个大麻烦。要是他们杀了根本不该杀的人，那该怎么办？可他们的做法已经得到了官方许可，所以我也别无选择，只能放任那群杀人犯在我们之中大摇大摆。”
languages.original_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

traits.locale_text: “我觉得这显然不太对劲，舰长大人。我听说，他们杀人全靠什么预兆，这对我来说简直是个大麻烦。要是他们杀了根本不该杀的人，那该怎么办？可他们的做法已经得到了官方许可，所以我也别无选择，只能放任那群杀人犯在我们之中大摇大摆。”

languages.text: "Ganz bestimmt, Lord Captain. Ich hörte, sie wählen ihre Opfer aufgrund von Omen aus, und allein das klingt für mich nach Ärger. Was, wenn sie beschließen, jemanden zu töten, den sie nicht töten sollten? Nachdem der Kult aber offiziell erlaubt ist, bleibt mir nichts anderes übrig, als Killer in unserer Mitte zu tolerieren."
languages.original_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz bestimmt, Lord Captain. Ich hörte, sie wählen ihre Opfer aufgrund von Omen aus, und allein das klingt für mich nach Ärger. Was, wenn sie beschließen, jemanden zu töten, den sie nicht töten sollten? Nachdem der Kult aber offiziell erlaubt ist, bleibt mir nichts anderes übrig, als Killer in unserer Mitte zu tolerieren."

languages.text: « Oh que si, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. On raconte qu'ils choisissent leurs victimes sur la base de présages mystiques, et cela seul m'inquiète au plus haut point. Imaginez un peu qu'ils s'avisent de tuer la personne qu'il ne faut pas... Enfin, puisque les agissements du culte sont officiellement autorisés, je n'ai d'autre choix que de tolérer la présence de ses assassins dans nos rangs. »
languages.original_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."

traits.locale_text: « Oh que si, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. On raconte qu'ils choisissent leurs victimes sur la base de présages mystiques, et cela seul m'inquiète au plus haut point. Imaginez un peu qu'ils s'avisent de tuer la personne qu'il ne faut pas... Enfin, puisque les agissements du culte sont officiellement autorisés, je n'ai d'autre choix que de tolérer la présence de ses assassins dans nos rangs. »

languages.text: "Kesinlikle var Lord Kaptan. Kurbanlarını alametlere göre seçtiklerini duydum. Bu da benim kulağımda bela diye çınlıyor. Ya öldürmemeleri gereken birini öldürmeye karar verirlerse? Gelin görün ki tarikat, eylemlerinde resmî izne sahip. Bu nedenle katillerin aramızda dolaşmasına tahammül etmekten başka seçeneğim yok."
languages.original_text: "I most certainly do, Lord Captain. I've heard they choose their victims based on omens, and that just screams trouble to me. What if they decide to kill someone they're not supposed to? But the cult's actions are officially permitted, so I have no choice but to tolerate killers walking in our midst."
